data.title: Kirby Dick: In The Political Closet, Dark Shadows
data.meta_description: In Outrage, the Oscar-nominated director looks into the hidden lives of some of America's most powerful policymakers â€” closeted gay legislators and executives with voting records that activists decry as virulently anti-gay. He says it's a film about hypocrisy.
